mapper.select: SELECT t1.*,t2.FHumanName as humanName,t2.FUserName as userName,t2.FEmail as email FROM orderApplyCc t1 LEFT JOIN tsysuser t2 ON t1.empId = t2.FUserName LEFT JOIN crm_work_order t3 ON t1.transId = t3.id WHERE t1.transId = #{transId} and t1.originalType = 0

SELECT t1.*,t2.FHumanName as humanName,t2.FUserName as userName,t2.FEmail as email FROM orderApplyCc t1 LEFT JOIN tsysuser t2 ON t1.empId = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN crm_work_order t3 ON t1.transId = t3.id WHERE t1.empId = #{empId}

SELECT t1.*,t3.name as status_desc,(case WHEN t1.work_order_type = 1 THEN '质量' else '需求' end) as type_desc FROM crm_work_order t1 LEFT JOIN orderStatus t3 on t1.order_status = t3.id WHERE exists( SELECT t2.* FROM orderApplyCc t2 WHERE t2.transId=t1.id AND originalType=0 AND t2.empId=#{empId})

SELECT t1.*,t3.name as status_desc FROM subOrder t1 LEFT JOIN orderStatus t3 on t1.orderStatus = t3.id WHERE exists( SELECT t2.* FROM orderApplyCc t2 WHERE t2.transId=t1.id AND originalType=1 AND t2.empId=#{empId})

SELECT t1.*,t2.FHumanName as humanName,t2.FUserName as userName,t2.FEmail as email FROM orderApplyCc t1 LEFT JOIN tsysuser t2 ON t1.empId = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN subOrder t3 ON t1.transId = t3.id WHERE t1.transId = #{transId} and t1.originalType = 1
